SELECT c.channel_no channelNo, c.pv pv, d.nv nv, c.uv uv FROM ( SELECT a.channel_no, SUM(a.pv) pv, COUNT(DISTINCT a.mac) uv FROM statistics.channel_visit_summary a WHERE 1=1 AND a.begin_time >= #{startTime} AND a.end_time <= #{endTime} GROUP BY a.channel_no ) c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(mac) nv, channel_no FROM statistics.channel_visit_summary a WHERE a.mac NOT IN ( SELECT b.mac FROM statistics.new_visitor b WHERE first_visit_time <= #{startTime} ) AND a.begin_time >=#{startTime} AND a.end_time <= #{endTime} GROUP BY a.channel_no ) d ON c.channel_no = d.channel_no
WHERE c.channel_no = #{channelNo}

SELECT log.channel, log.mac, MAX(log.timestamp) TIMESTAMP, log.session, m.district_id districtId, m.block_id blockId, m.residence_id residenceId FROM `api_logs_shfctv` log LEFT JOIN mac_info m ON log.mac = m.mac WHERE log.timestamp <= #{endTime} AND log.timestamp >= #{startTime} GROUP BY log.mac,log.`session` ORDER BY log.`timestamp` desc

SELECT log_id logId,channel,mac,`timestamp` timeStamp,session FROM api_logs_shfctv WHERE session = #{log.session} AND timestamp < #{log.timeStamp} AND timestamp > DATE_ADD(#{log.timeStamp}, INTERVAL -2 HOUR)

SELECT log_id logId,channel,mac,`timestamp` timeStamp,session FROM api_logs_shfctv WHERE timestamp > #{log.timestamp} AND mac = #{log.mac} and channel = #{log.channle} AND session = #{log.session} ORDER BY `timestamp` DESC
SELECT block_id from mac_info WHERE mac = #{log.mac}
select residence_id from mac_info WHERE mac = #{log.mac}

SELECT log_id logId, channel, mac, min(`timestamp`) TIMESTAMP, SESSION FROM api_logs_shfctv WHERE TIMESTAMP < #{log.timeStamp} AND `timestamp` > #{startTime} AND mac = #{log.mac} AND channel = #{log.channel} AND session = #{log.session}
